channel.title: Setting up a HIPAA-compliant server
channel.description:
This is posted on HN, but I thought it might be of interest to this community, for anybody doing product development or consulting in the healthcare field (which I'm not, but it's the sort of thing I bookmark and promptly forget):
Ask HN: How do I set up a HIPAA-compliant server? https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=8347418

item.title: Setting up a HIPAA-compliant server
item.dc:creator: perceptec
item.description:
And another potential resource, also mentioned on HN:

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=8461078

Direct link:

http://catalyzeio.github.io/policies/

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up a HIPAA-compliant server
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
This is interesting, thanks! Considering offering a HelpSpot HIPAA version in the future.
